title: The Pink Gun Mystery
description: When a complicated Texas love triangle ends in murder, a pink gun leads to an arrest, until new evidence prompts investigators to rethink the case. Josh Mankiewicz reports.
author: nbcnews.podcasts@gmail.com (NBC News)
